name: Spaceship Survivors
description:
Spaceship Survivors is an anime-style arena survivor roguelike where you play in space to fight against loads of alien spaceships.
Create unique builds to survive and kill the final boss, or go for an endless run. You can unlock 33 playable spaceships.
If you need more challenge, then the speed run mode is your go-to.

60+ skill items
33 playable spaceships
2 game modes
4 spaceship classes
10 legendary spaceships with unique starting skills
5 pilots with unique starting bonuses
Unlimited build variations
